name: Rum Barrel
description: This is “one of Don the Beachcomber's baroque 1940s masterpieces,” Jeff Berry says, and he didn’t change a thing when he put it on the menu at Latitude 29. Yes, that’s quite a long list of ingredients, but they coalesce into a memorable drink and a classic, quintessential tiki experience.
keywords: falernum, grapefruit juice, orange juice, pineapple juice, rum, St. Elizabeth allspice liqueur
recipeIngredient: 1 oz. honey syrup (1 part honey dissolved in 1 part warm water; let cool)

recipeInstructions.text: Put everything into a blender, saving ice for last. Blend at high speed for 5 seconds. Pour into a ceramic rum barrel or a large snifter. Add ice cubes to fill.
Garnish: mint, fresh pineapple and an edible purple orchid.
